description: The number of citations to works that have been tagged with this topic. Or less formally: the number of citations to this topic.
name: cited_by_count

description: The date this Topic object was created in the OpenAlex dataset, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string.
name: created_date

description: A description of this topic, generated by AI.
name: description

description: The English-language label of the topic.
name: display_name
domain
description: The ID and the name (display_name) for the domain of this topic. The domain is the highest level in the domain, field, subfield, topic system, which means it is the least granular.

name: field
description: The ID and the name (display_name) for the field of this topic. The field is the second-highest level in the domain, field, subfield, topic system, which means it is the second-least granular.
The OpenAlex ID for this topic.
name: id
ids
description: All the external identifiers that we know about for this topic. IDs are expressed as URIs whenever possible.
Keywords consisting of one or several words each, meant to represent the content of the papers in the topic. These keywords were generated as part of the AI model.
name: keywords
subfield
description: The ID and the name (display_name) for the subfield of this topic. The subfield is the third-highest level in the domain, field, subfield, topic system, which means it is the third-least granular.
The last time anything in this topic object changed, expressed as an ISO 8601 date string. This date is updated for any change at all, including increases in various counts.
name: updated_date

description: The number of works tagged with this topic.
name: works_count
